data.title: Marisa Pavan
data.meta_description: Marisa Pavan's entire career in cinema, television, singing, dramaturgy and radio is thoroughly covered in this section.
data.text:
🎞 Cinema

1950s (10)

🇺🇸 1952 – What Price Glory (John Ford, Twentieth Century-Fox)

Role: Nicole Bouchard

Cast: James Cagney (Capt. Flagg), Corinne Calvet (Charmaine), Dan Dailey (1st Sergeant Quirt), William Demarest (Cpl. Kiper), Craig Hill (Lt. Aldrich), Robert Wagner (Pvt. Lewisohn), Casey Adams (Lt. Moore), James Gleason (Gen. Cokely), Wally Vernon (Lipinsky), Henri Letondal (Cognac Pete)

🇮🇹 1953 – I Chose Love (Mario Zampi, Film Costellazione)

Role: Maria

Cast: Renato Rascel (Boris Popovic), Edoardo Passarelli (A sacristan), Margherita Bagni (The florist), Michele Abruzzo (Vitali), Gianni Rizzo, Lia Di Leo (Paola), Kiki Urbani, Paolo Panelli (The count’s son), Gino Cavalieri, Carlo Mazzarella (A young Communist), Pietro Tordi (A Communist), Ettore G. Mattia, Peppino De Martino, Manlio Busoni, Giulio Calì (The Republican), Dina Perbellini (A lady at the banquet), Cesco Baseggio (The violinist), Frederick Valk
